release.name: v1.0.0
release.body:
## [1.0.0](https://example.com/compare/v0.9.0...v1.0.0) (1970-01-01)

### Features
* **core:** added initial release ([abc1234](https://example.com/commit/abc1234))
* **api:** implemented endpoints ([def5678](https://example.com/commit/def5678))

### Bug Fixes
* **ui:** fixed button alignment ([#42](https://example.com/issues/42)) ([789abcd](https://example.com/commit/789abcd))

### Miscellaneous
* see [PR #7](https://example.com/pull/7) for details
